income_messages:
From: p*************7@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-21 17:17:52
SUBJECT:   Dearest,
  Dearest,
My name is Patrick James, a US citizen, I am diagnosed  with Esophageal Cancer that was discovered very late due to my laxity in caring for my health. It has defiled all type of medicine at the moment, I have just a few months to live according to medical experts. I have not particularly lived my life so well, as i don't really care for anyone not even myself but my business.
Though I am very rich, I wasn't generous, I was always hostile to people and focus on my business as that was the thing I cared for. But I regret all this as I now know that there is more to life than just wanting to have or make all the wealth in the world. I believe when God gives me a second chance to come to this world I would live my life a different way from how I have lived it. Now that I know my time is near, I have willed and given most of my properties and assets to my immediate and extended family members and as well as a few close friends.
I have decided to give alms to charity, The last of my wealth which is the huge cash deposit that I have with a financial institute abroad. I will want you to help me collect this deposit and use it to help people in need and also open a charity institution in my memorial. I am writing this from my laptop computer in my sickbed where I wait for my time to come. I pray that God uses you to support me.
Regards
Mr. Patrick James   
From: p*************7@gmail.com
To: bk99215@m**************p
Time: 2023-02-21 22:57:29
SUBJECT: Re: Dearest,
Dear Beloved ,
Thanks for the response, I trustfully appreciated the fact that you really
wanted to assist me in the funds distributions. However, my intention was
to search for a compassionate individual who is willing to use this fund
for the establishment of a charitable organization and name it after me as
a memorial.
I have actually entrusted my family members with this task but they all
failed. Instead of using the fund for the said purpose they use it for
their own personal and selfish gain which has made me to seek help abroad
and you must assure me that you will use the fund for the intended purpose
and not like family members.
Due to my health condition, it is difficult to write a lengthy email
otherwise I would have used this medium as a forum to give you every
detail. In any case, if you are willing to carry out my request as I have
said very briefly then feel free to reply to me so that I can introduce you
to my resident Attorney who will be in the position to provide you with
every detail as regards to the fund and my intentions.
I want to carefully emphasize that this is an endowment fund / private
donation.
Regards,
Patrick James
outbound_messages:

SUBJECT: Re:   Dearest,

 Why are you treating this matter like your business partner? If you wanted to help me, just went there and said you were trying to scam me. I'm not upset with you or your business, didn't I?
Best,
Jacqueline
